notes: Well-maintained apartment with modern dark wood cabinetry and recessed lighting throughout. The unit has at least 3 bedrooms with good natural light from multiple windows and appears clean. For baby safety, the floors are smooth tile which is easy to clean but slippery; the furniture has some sharp corners on dressers and desks that would need padding; no visible balcony railings or stairs in photos. Being on the 1st floor eliminates stair/elevator concerns but may mean less privacy and natural light.
